name: Full Name

contactsError: At least one contact is required
change_status_title: Are you sure you want to change the status of this job ?
change_status_description: Please note that changing the status may affect visibility and other related settings. If you proceed, the current status will be updated.
delete_title: Are you sure you want to delete this job?
delete_description:
Deleting this job is a permanent action and cannot be undone. Once deleted, all information related to this job will be lost.
Please confirm if you wish to proceed with deletion.
